price: Can you save those against whom the decree of punishment has been passed to be in the Fire?
arabic: أَفَمَنۡ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
